security_audit.summary: Legitimate research tool with Python scripts that query the OpenAlex scholarly database API. Network requests target the official api.openalex.org endpoint. File writing is limited to CSV export for research data. No credential theft, no persistence mechanisms, no suspicious network destinations.

content.user_title: Search scholarly literature in OpenAlex database
content.value_statement: Finding and analyzing academic papers requires navigating multiple databases and formats. This skill provides a unified Python client to search 240M+ scholarly works, track citations, and analyze research output from authors and institutions worldwide.
actual_capabilities: Search 240M+ scholarly works by topic, author, or institution
Track citations and find papers that cite specific works
Analyze research output and publication trends over time
Find open access papers filtered by OA status
Batch lookup multiple DOIs, ORCIDs, or other identifiers
Extract large datasets with pagination and export to CSV
limitations: No API key required but email recommended for higher rate limits
Limited to OpenAlex database only (no cross-database search)
Large exports require careful pagination to avoid timeouts

best_practices: Initialize the client with your email address to access the polite pool (10x rate limit boost)
Use the two-step pattern: search for entity ID first, then filter by that ID
Batch multiple IDs together using pipe separator instead of individual requests
anti_patterns: Filtering by entity names directly instead of using IDs
Using random page numbers for sampling (use sample parameter instead)
Making sequential API calls for batch lookups

faq.question: What is the rate limit without an email?
faq.answer: Default pool allows 1 request per second and 100,000 requests per day.

faq.question: Does this skill work with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill is designed for Claude Code and supports all Claude models.

faq.question: Can I search across multiple databases?
faq.answer: No, this skill only queries the OpenAlex database. Use other skills for other databases.

faq.question: Is my search data kept private?
faq.answer: Queries are sent directly to OpenAlex API. No additional data collection occurs.

faq.question: Why am I getting rate limit errors?
faq.answer: Add your email to the client constructor for 10x higher rate limits (10 req/sec).

faq.question: How does this compare to Google Scholar?
faq.answer: OpenAlex provides structured API access with citation counts but no full-text search.
